Package: io.vertx.groovy.ext.auth.shiro

[Groovy] Class ShiroAuth

      • io.vertx.groovy.ext.auth.shiro.ShiroAuth

      • Factory interface for creating Apache Shiro based io.vertx.groovy.ext.auth.AuthProvider instances.

          • ShiroAuth setRolePrefix(String rolePrefix)

            Set the role prefix to distinguish from permissions when checking for isPermitted requests.

            Returns:
            a reference to this for fluency
            Parameters:
            rolePrefix - a Prefix e.g.: "role:"
